66:
The ABA agreed to be absorbed by the NBA.

At the time of the merger, the ABA was home to 7 teams.

Four were absorbed by the NBA:

Denver Nuggets
Indiana Pacers
New Jersey Nets
San Antonio Spurs

One (Virginia Squires) folded.

And the remaining two were offered buyouts.
